author: Pete Santini
comment: Be prepared to spend money at every turn. I didn't even fully set my profile up and was being told to buy coins to chat... yeah, negative.

author: Eugene S
comment: You have to pay for "matches" to talk to them before you even see who they are. And most of those are dozens if not 100s of miles away. And they don't optimize who you match w/ based on rating other profiles, that's just there to make it look like matches are more than random.

author: Darren Lightburn Jr.
comment: This app is only here to make someone rich, not find you love.  Steer clear of this money grab. You'll NEVER be matched with someone you actually rate highly. Actually they match you with guys who are the exact OPPOSITE of your type. Guys who I would give 1 star to (much like this app) Then they tell you to buy overpriced "crowns" to talk to someone who possibly rated you as high as you rated them. But they'll never put them in your matches to talk. This app is preying on lonely singles. They want your money, NOT your happiness. That's why it costs to do everything.

author: Joe Perrin
comment: Great idea and easy to use but when they are unable to find a match for you every day for over a week now, it starts to like a useless app. They need to make sure they are more consistent with have a match more often, preferably everyday.

author: Timothy Christopher
comment: You literally have to pay for almost the most basic of functions you'd expect out of a free app to meet people with. Like messaging. Or communicating at all. I literally have people wanting to message me and i can't even ACCEPT the invitation to communicate without using credits. And when you actually DO use the micro transaction method to do so with the little bit of free credits you start with, there is no way to get more without paying. For instance. "Like the app on Facebook" and get access to more "credits" to stockpile so you can talk to people, only to really never get them lol. It's a waste. I'm going back to tinder. I won't say the concept is nice, but it's different.....That's really it. So I'll give it 3 stars when it prolly deserves 1 for functionality.  Update: this app is terrible. You have to literally pay to talk to people before you even get a chance to see them or their profile when sent chat requests. And you still have to pay to initiate conversations too. So even if you do decide to pay to talk to somebody you can almost forget it that they'll pay to accept your invite to talk. Especially if they refuse to keep spending $10 every 2-3 people when's there's TONS of other apps that let you do that for free. I'm deleting this right after this review in hopes it helps somebody else.

author: Angela Oakes
comment: Still getting used to it, no luck so far, but who knows... Interesting concept!

author: Andrew Denne
comment: It's nice until you want to message someone... It's 9.99 for 2 messages and they have to pay 9.99 to message you back, good luck.

author: we dem zoe
comment: Tinder all day you guys will never be on tinder level  you guys such  a ripped off

author: Because Of Paranoia
comment: Expensive if you want to do something as simple as location limitations

author: Abbie Thomas
comment: Just joined will review better at a later date... After I've had time to use it and see...

author: The Real Miklo
comment: We all know there's fake profiles but at least this app let's you point it out.

author: Jon Lind
comment: It's ok but I'm not paying to talk to someone because talking is free 😉

author: Bartek Miniszewski
comment: Dissapoitment I was looking for any chance to chat, but all i can do is rating girls pictures My picture was somehow removed after 6h of use.

author: Jethro Jester
comment: Everything is pay to play... Wanna send a message? Pay for it... Someone sends you a message pay to receive it and start chatting.

author: joe brinkley
comment: Really nice easy to use. Plus so far no scams yet that god

author: Spiro Korizis
comment: Have to pay to chat
Distrugge la batteria se lasciata in background. Android avvisa sempre che consuma un sacco di energia.

comment: Just started it's ok I like it

comment: Just started, looks to be ok

comment: Looks nice, for sure better than others apps

comment: Its amazing to meet new people around you when you are new in tow...amazing app

comment: Less addictive in a good way!! More focused

comment: Good alternative to tinder. Easy to use

It's good

comment: Great app
Its good

author: Daniel Mcstravick
comment: Great app

author: Terry Brookes
comment: Great app

author: Everton Yukio Aoyagi
comment: Nice

author: Bogunmbe Abimbola
comment: Coooool

Once asks users to rate potential matches based on looks alone to find better match, but that is false, all but one of my matches are the complete opposite of what I am looking for, and doesn't take into account other attributes I am looking for in a potential match. Also to begin a chat it costs two crowns from you and 2 crowns from the person you want to chat with, making it much less likely they will accept the chat. A better app is Coffee meets Bagel; it's similar, but less expensive, better settings, and more potential matches, without being overwhelming.

author: Lukasz Blazak
comment: Scummy cash grab. Ridiculously over priced to do anything, £3 to slide in a inbox.  Don't subscribe to the service. There is no way in app to cancel this. I had to go on the website to do this however they didn't actually end my subscription even though I had cancelled the subscription and deleted my account. Thought it was weird i had no confirmation email, had to go on Google play and it was still active so had to cancel from there. Don't bother with this waste of time

author: Nick van der Made
comment: I like the fact that you only get one match a day, that way you take it more seriously. I only have a problem with the fact that you have to pay when someone else wants to talk to you. They already paid to write a message I presume, why should I pay to accept the message? Maybe it's an idea to be able to accept it without being able to view the profile (that would be free). That way, you need to make a conversation to get to know the person.
